RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Advogado da Unio (2005 - Presente), atualmente em exerccio na Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional do Ministrio da Economia. Doutor em Cincia Poltica pela "Universit degli Studi Roma Tre" (2014 - 2018), com um perodo de pesquisa na "Corvinus University of Budapest" (2015 - 2016). Pesquisador em Sociologia do Direito e da Administrao na "Universit degli Studi di Genova" (2009 - 2010). Mestre em Direito Constitucional (2005 - 2007) e Bacharel em Direito (2000 - 2005) pela Universidade de Braslia. reas de experincia profissional: Direito Constitucional, Direito Administrativo, Direito Econmico, Direito Internacional, Direito e Polticas Pblicas. reas de interesse acadmico: Constitucionalismo Global, Direito Administrativo Global, Direito e Desenvolvimento, Empresas e Direitos Humanos, Direito e Tecnologia, Governana da Internet.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Federal Attorney at the Brazilian Office of the Attorney General of the Union (2005 - Present). PhD in Political Science from the University Roma Tre (2014 - 2018), with a period of research at the Corvinus University of Budapest (2015 - 2016). Researcher in Sociology of Law and Administration at the University of Genoa (2009 - 2010). Master in Constitutional Law (2005 - 2007) and Bachelor in Law (2000 - 2005) from the University of Brasilia. Areas of professional expertise: Constitutional Law, Administrative Law, Economic Law, International Law, Law and Public Policies. Areas of academic interest: Global Constitutionalism, Global Administrative Law, Law and Development, Human Rights and Corporations, Law and Technology, Internet Governance.

GRADUACAO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-DE-CONCLUSAO-DE-CURSO: Dilemas do Direito Pblico Contemporneo: riscos e possibilidades da interveno estatal na economia a partir do modelo de rgos reguladores independentes

MESTRADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: O uso criativo dos paradoxos do direito na aplicao de princpios constitucionais: abertura, autoritarismo e pragmatismo na jurisdio constitucional brasileira

DOUTORADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Transnational Constitutional Conflicts in Cyberspace? Google and the European Union

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Instituto Brasileiro de Defesa do Consumidor

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Principais atividades: (i) pesquisa jurisprudencial, pesquisa legislativa e acompanhamento processual nas reas de direito do consumidor e direito sanitrio; (ii) pesquisa sobre o grau de cumprimento da legislao sobre propaganda e publicidade de produtos sujeitos vigilncia sanitria pelas empresas do setor.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Main tasks: (i) legal research, legal practice and advocacy in the areas of consumer law and health law; (ii) research on the level of compliance with the legislation on advertisement and publicity of products under sanitary control by the companies of the sector.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Principais atividades: (i) regulao e fiscalizao da propaganda e publicidade de produtos sujeitos vigilncia sanitria; (ii) anlise de processos administrativos instaurados para apurar a prtica de infraes legislao sobre propaganda e publicidade de produtos sujeitos vigilncia sanitria; (iii) elaborao, reviso e atualizao de normas sobre propaganda e publicidade de produtos sujeitos vigilncia sanitria.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Main tasks: (i) regulation and supervision over advertisement and publicity of products under sanitary control; (ii) analysis of administrative procedures set up to verify the practice of violations of the legislation on advertisement and publicity of products under sanitary control; (iii) drafting and revision of regulations on advertisement and publicity of products under sanitary control.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Principais atividades: (i) consultoria jurdica em assuntos constitucionais, administrativos, regulatrios, econmicos e internacionais; (ii) modelagem jurdica de polticas pblicas nas reas de planejamento, oramento, gesto, recursos humanos e compras governamentais; (iii) anlise jurdica do relacionamento da administrao pblica central com suas empresas estatais; (iv) anlise jurdica do relacionamento institucional do governo brasileiro com organizaes internacionais; (v) anlise jurdica de acordos de cooperao internacional.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Main tasks: (i) legal advice on constitutional, administrative, regulatory, economic and international issues; (ii) legal design of public policies in the areas of planning, budget, management, human resources and procurement; (iii) legal analysis of the relationship between the central government and its state-owned enterprises; (iv) legal analysis of the institutional relationship between the Brazilian Government and international organizations; (v) legal analysis of international cooperation agreements.

DIRECAO-E-ADMINISTRACAO.NOME-ORGAO: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto
DIRECAO-E-ADMINISTRACAO.CARGO-OU-FUNCAO: Coordenador de Atos Normativos e Assuntos Econmicos e Internacionais Substituto

DIRECAO-E-ADMINISTRACAO.NOME-ORGAO: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto
DIRECAO-E-ADMINISTRACAO.CARGO-OU-FUNCAO: Coordenador-Geral Jurdico de Assuntos Oramentrios, Econmicos e Internacionais Substituto

OUTRA-ATIVIDADE-TECNICO-CIENTIFICA.NOME-ORGAO: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto
OUTRA-ATIVIDADE-TECNICO-CIENTIFICA.NOME-UNIDADE: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto

OUTRA-ATIVIDADE-TECNICO-CIENTIFICA.NOME-ORGAO: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto
OUTRA-ATIVIDADE-TECNICO-CIENTIFICA.NOME-UNIDADE: Ministrio do Planejamento, Oramento e Gesto

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Principais atividades: (i) assessoria e anlise de processos administrativos na rea de direito do terceiro setor; (ii) elaborao, reviso e atualizao de normas na rea de direito do terceiro setor.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Main tasks: (i) analysis of administrative procedures in the area of the law of public interest non-governmental organizations; (ii) drafting and revision of regulations in the area of the law of public interest non-governmental organizations.

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Dipartimento di Cultura Giuridica Giovanni Tarello
PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-UNIDADE: Sezione di Filosofia e Sociologia del Diritto

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Avvocatura dello Stato, amministrazione pubblica e democrazia: il ruolo della consulenza legale nella formulazione ed esecuzione delle politiche pubbliche
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Pesquisa sobre Advocacia de Estado que buscou analisar a funo das atividades de consultoria jurdica desempenhadas pela Advocacia de Estado no mbito da administrao pblica, com especial destaque para os contextos brasileiro e italiano. Com o auxlio da teoria dos sistemas sociais desenvolvida pelo socilogo alemo Niklas Luhmann, as atividades de consultoria jurdica foram descritas como uma espcie de traduo entre os sistemas jurdico e poltico. A funo da consultoria jurdica seria, ento, a de traduzir os programas jurdicos que condicionam a atividade poltico-discricionria da administrao pblica, com o objetivo principal de contribuir para a legitimidade e a eficincia das polticas pblicas necessrias promoo dos direitos fundamentais dos cidados.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Research on state lawyering that tried to analyse the role of legal advice in the public administration, regarding mainly the Brazilian and Italian State lawyering realities. With the support of the systems theory of the german sociologist Niklas Luhmann, the activity of providing legal advice was described as a kind of translation between the legal and political systems. The role of legal advice would be therefore to translate the legal programs that regulate the political and discretionary activities of the public administration, as a means to contribute to the legitimacy and efficiency of the public policies that promote the fundamental rights of the citizens.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Avvocatura dello Stato, amministrazione pubblica e democrazia: il ruolo della consulenza legale nella formulazione ed esecuzione delle politiche pubbliche

PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TITULO-DA-PRODUCAO-CT: Avvocatura dello Stato, amministrazione pubblica e democrazia: il ruolo della consulenza legale nella formulazione ed esecuzione delle politiche pubbliche
PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TITULO-DA-PRODUCAO-CT-INGLES: State lawyering, public administration and democracy: the role of legal advice in the formulation and execution of public policies

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Professor do Curso de Especializao em Direito Pblico para membros da Advocacia-Geral da Unio ? AGU. Disciplina ministrada: Direito Administrativo I. Carga horria: 16h.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Professor of the Post Graduation Course in Public Law for Federal Attorneys. Course: Administrative Law I. Hours: 16h.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Tutor do Curso Online de Especializao em Direito Pblico para membros da Advocacia-Geral da Unio ? AGU.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Tutor of the Online Post Graduation Course in Public Law for Federal Attorneys.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Dossi Justia: uma proposta de observao da relao entre constituio e democracia no Brasil
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Pesquisa sobre o acesso justia no Brasil que buscou subsidiar a elaborao de um programa nacional de democratizao do acesso justia e contribuir para a institucionalizao de um Observatrio da Justia no Brasil.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Research on access to justice in Brazil that tried to support the formulation of a national policy of democratization of the access to justice and contribute to the institutionalization of an Observatory of Justice in Brazil.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Justice Dossier: a proposal for the observation of the relation between constituttion and democracy in Brazil

PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TITULO-DA-PRODUCAO-CT: Jurisdio constitucional e concentrao do acesso a justia: a voz que vem de cima
PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TITULO-DA-PRODUCAO-CT-INGLES: Constitutional adjudication and the concentration of the access to justice: the voice that comes from above

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Observatrio da Constituio e da Democracia
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Projeto de extenso do Grupo de Pesquisa Sociedade, Tempo e Direito dedicado produo do peridico "Constituio & Democracia", que contm artigos voltados para a anlise crtica de conjuntura da relao entre constituio e democracia no Brasil.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: External academic project carried out by the research group Society, Time and Law that consists in the edition and publication of the journal "Constitution & Democracy", which contains brief articles that analyse the contemporary relation between constitution and democracy in Brazil.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Percursos, narrativas e fragmentos: Histria do Direito e do Constitucionalismo
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Grupo de Pesquisa dedicado anlise e discusso de temas relevantes da histria do direito e do constitucionalismo, com especial destaque ao contexto brasileiro.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Research group dedicated to the analysis and discussion of relevant subjects of the history of law and constitutionalism, regarding mainly the Bralizian context.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Percursos, narrativas e fragmentos: Histria do Direito e do Constitucionalismo

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Grupo de Pesquisa dedicado anlise e discusso de problemas atuais da sociedade moderna e da teoria do direito contempornea a partir das teorias de Boaventura de Souza Santos, Jrgen Habermas e Niklas Luhmann.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Research group dedicated to the analysis and discussion of actual problems of modern society and contemporary legal theory from the perspective of the social theories of Boaventura de Souza Santos, Jrgen Habermas and Niklas Luhmann.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Principais atividades: (i) anlise de processos judiciais nas reas de direito penal e direito processual penal; (ii) elaborao de pareceres ministeriais nas reas de direito penal e direito processual penal.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Main tasks: (i) analysis of judicial procedures in the areas of criminal law and criminal procedure law; (ii) drafting of legal opinions in the areas of criminal law and criminal procedure law.

PREMIO-TITULO.NOME-DO-PREMIO-OU-TITULO: Certificazione di Italiano come Lingue Straniera (CILS) - Livello Quattro (C2)
Certificate of Advanced English (CAE) - Level C1
Diplme dtudes en Langue Franaise (DELF) - Niveau B2
Certificate of Hungarian as a Foreign Language (ECL) - Level B2

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Public administration, law and development in Brazil: building legally sustainable public policies for an inclusionary state
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Public administration, law and development in Brazil: building legally sustainable public policies for an inclusionary state

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XVII Congreso Internacional del CLAD sobre la Reforma del Estado y de la Administracin Pblica

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Avvocatura dello Stato, amministrazione pubblica e democrazia: il ruolo della consulenza legale nella formulazione ed esecuzione delle politiche pubbliche
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: State lawyering, public administration and democracy: the role of legal advice in the formulation and execution of public policies

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: L?articolo avanza una tesi generale sulla funzione delle attività di consu- lenza legale svolte dall?Avvocatura dello Stato nell?ambito della pubblica am- ministrazione, con attenzione speciale ai contesti brasiliano e italiano. Con l?aiuto della teoria dei sistemi sociali sviluppata dal sociologo tedesco Niklas Luhmann, le attività di consulenza legale sono descritte come una specie di traduzione fra i sistemi giuridico e politico. La funzione della consulenza le- gale sarebbe quindi quella di tradurre i programmi giuridici che condizionano l?attività politico-discrezionale della pubblica amministrazione, con l?obiettivo principale di contribuire alla legittimità e alla efficienza delle politiche pub- bliche necessarie alla promozione dei diritti fondamentali dei cittadini.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The article advances a general thesis about the role of legal advice in the public administration, regarding mainly the Brazilian and Italian State lawyering realities. With the support of the systems theory of the german sociologist Niklas Luhmann, the provision of legal advice is described as a kind of translation between the legal and political systems. The role of legal advice would be therefore to translate the legal programs that regulate the political and discretionary activities of the public administration, as a means to contribute to the legitimacy and efficiency of the public policies that promote the fundamental rights of the citizens.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Constitucionalismo e Estado Democrtico de Direito: a constituio como comunidade de princpios ou como ordem concreta de valores?
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Constitutionalism and the rule of law: the constitution as a concrete order of values or as a community of principles?

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: O uso criativo dos paradoxos do direito no reconhecimento e aplicao de princpios constitucionais implcitos
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The creative use of legal paradoxes in the recognition and enforcement of implicit constitutional principles

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Advocacia de Estado, administrao pblica e democracia: a funo da consultoria jurdica na formulao e execuo de polticas pblicas
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: State lawyering, public administration and democracy: the role of legal advice in the formulation and execution of public policies

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O artigo desenvolve uma tese geral sobre a função das atividades de consultoria jurídica desempenhadas pela Advocacia de Estado no âmbito da administração pública, com especial destaque para os contextos brasileiro e italiano. Com o auxílio da teoria dos sistemas sociais desenvolvida pelo sociólogo alemão Niklas Luhmann, as atividades de consultoria jurídica são descritas como uma espécie de tradução entre os sistemas jurídico e político. A função da consultoria jurídica seria, então, a de traduzir os programas jurídicos que condicionam a atividade político-discricionária da administração pública, com o objetivo principal de contribuir para a legitimidade e a eficiência das políticas públicas necessárias à promoção dos direitos fundamentais dos cidadãos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The article advances a general thesis about the role of legal advice in the public administration, regarding mainly the Brazilian and Italian State lawyering realities. With the support of the systems theory of the german sociologist Niklas Luhmann, the provision of legal advice is described as a kind of translation between the legal and political systems. The role of legal advice would be therefore to translate the legal programs that regulate the political and discretionary activities of the public administration, as a means to contribute to the legitimacy and efficiency of the public policies that promote the fundamental rights of the citizens.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Modernidade, Crime e Estado de Exceo: o direito penal inimigo do cidado
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Modernity, Crime and State of Exception: the criminal law enemy of the citizen

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O artigo analisa criticamente a teoria do direito penal do inimigo proposta por Gnther Jakobs. Aps uma breve descrio dos seus principais fundamentos, ela submetida a uma leitura desconstrutiva, que tem como base a teoria da sociedade moderna de Niklas Luhmann, autor bastante citado pelo prprio Jakobs para fundamentar pontos importantes da sua teoria. O objetivo demonstrar o carter autoritrio e as incompatibilidades de um direito penal do inimigo em relao s conquistas histricas do constitucionalismo e ao carter plural e hipercomplexo da sociedade moderna.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The article analyses in a critical way the criminal law for the enemy proposed by Gnther Jakobs. After a brief description of its main points, it is submitted to a deconstructive view based on the theory of modern society of Niklas Luhmann, an author very quoted by Jakobs in order to support some basic foundations of its own theory. The main purpose is to demonstrate the authoritarian characters of a criminal law founded on the idea of the enemy and its inconsistencies with the plural and complex features of modern society.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Public Administration, Law and Development in Brazil: Building Legally Sustainable Public Policies for an Inclusionary State
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Public Administration, Law and Development in Brazil: Building Legally Sustainable Public Policies for an Inclusionary State

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Taking into consideration the Law and Development approach and some useful theoretical insights provided by systems theory, this article aims at analyzing the role of law in general, and state lawyering in particular, in the design and implementation of development policies that promote social inclusion, with special regard to the Brazilian context. Firstly, this role is described as the provision of ?legal sustainability? to government decisions and public policies in general. Then, the legal dimensions of three recent inclusionary policies in Brazil are stressed as an attempt to show how the goal of social inclusion can be pursued by means of law, with an active participation of state lawyers: (i) the Bolsa Famlia Program (BFP), (ii) the Pre-Salt Social Fund (PSSF) and (iii) the affirmative action programs adopted by some Brazilian universities, especially the University of Brasilia (UnB). At the end, some light is shed on the limits of the use of law as an instrument to foster develop- ment and social change. These limits, although inevitable, do not change the fact that the multiple demands for social inclusion and participation are always to be con- sidered as a matter of juridical justice in its ?sociological? sense.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Taking into consideration the Law and Development approach and some useful theoretical insights provided by systems theory, this article aims at analyzing the role of law in general, and state lawyering in particular, in the design and implementation of development policies that promote social inclusion, with special regard to the Brazilian context. Firstly, this role is described as the provision of ?legal sustainability? to government decisions and public policies in general. Then, the legal dimensions of three recent inclusionary policies in Brazil are stressed as an attempt to show how the goal of social inclusion can be pursued by means of law, with an active participation of state lawyers: (i) the Bolsa Famlia Program (BFP), (ii) the Pre-Salt Social Fund (PSSF) and (iii) the affirmative action programs adopted by some Brazilian universities, especially the University of Brasilia (UnB). At the end, some light is shed on the limits of the use of law as an instrument to foster develop- ment and social change. These limits, although inevitable, do not change the fact that the multiple demands for social inclusion and participation are always to be con- sidered as a matter of juridical justice in its ?sociological? sense.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: The City of Cyberia: un plagio/omaggio a Italo Calvino
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The City of Cyberia: un plagio/omaggio a Italo Calvino

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Infolet, Cultura e critica dei media digitali

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Global Technology and Legal Theory: Transnational Constitutionalism, Google and the European Union
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Global Technology and Legal Theory: Transnational Constitutionalism, Google and the European Union

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The rise and spread of the Internet has accelerated the global flows of money, technology and information that are increasingly perceived as a challenge to the traditional regulatory powers of nation states and the effectiveness of their constitutions. The acceleration of these flows poses new legal and political problems to their regulation and control, as shown by recent conflicts between Google and the European Union (EU).

This book investigates the transnational constitutional dimension of recent conflicts between Google and the EU in the areas of competition, taxation and human rights. More than a simple case study, it explores how the new conflicts originating from the worldwide expansion of the Internet economy are being dealt with by the institutional mechanisms available at the European level. The analysis of these conflicts exposes the tensions and contradictions between, on the one hand, legal and political systems that are limited by territory, and, on the other hand, the inherently global functioning of the Internet. The EU?s promising initiatives to extend the protection of privacy in cyberspace set the stage for a broader dialogue on constitutional problems related to the enforcement of fundamental rights and the legitimate exercise of power that are common to different legal orders of world society. Nevertheless, the different ways of dealing with the competition and fiscal aspects of the conflicts with Google also indicate the same limits that are generally attributed to the very project of European integration, showing that the constitutionalization of the economy tends to outpace the constitutionalization of politics.

Providing a detailed account of the unfolding of these conflicts, and their wider consequences to the future of the Internet, this book will appeal to scholars working in EU law, international law and constitutional law, as well as those in the fields of political science and sociology.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The rise and spread of the Internet has accelerated the global flows of money, technology and information that are increasingly perceived as a challenge to the traditional regulatory powers of nation states and the effectiveness of their constitutions. The acceleration of these flows poses new legal and political problems to their regulation and control, as shown by recent conflicts between Google and the European Union (EU).

This book investigates the transnational constitutional dimension of recent conflicts between Google and the EU in the areas of competition, taxation and human rights. More than a simple case study, it explores how the new conflicts originating from the worldwide expansion of the Internet economy are being dealt with by the institutional mechanisms available at the European level. The analysis of these conflicts exposes the tensions and contradictions between, on the one hand, legal and political systems that are limited by territory, and, on the other hand, the inherently global functioning of the Internet. The EU?s promising initiatives to extend the protection of privacy in cyberspace set the stage for a broader dialogue on constitutional problems related to the enforcement of fundamental rights and the legitimate exercise of power that are common to different legal orders of world society. Nevertheless, the different ways of dealing with the competition and fiscal aspects of the conflicts with Google also indicate the same limits that are generally attributed to the very project of European integration, showing that the constitutionalization of the economy tends to outpace the constitutionalization of politics.

Providing a detailed account of the unfolding of these conflicts, and their wider consequences to the future of the Internet, this book will appeal to scholars working in EU law, international law and constitutional law, as well as those in the fields of political science and sociology.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Administrative Law and the Reform of the State: an autopoietic analysis
